name: Centre for Promotion of equal Rights

briefDescription: CPER was Identified lot of dalit and children, women were in many issues, parents were also working with ceramic and construction workers, The present condition unemployment problems, Money lender issues and then children’s were dropout in school, many children parents were widows and destitute,  CPER  has planning to Empower the Dalit women and children is a right way to achieve a sustainable Equitable, CPER worked with the Dalit , women and children at cuddalore District in particulars most affected areas, For their empowerment at my Initial step.  newly Establishment of 6 villages of children development centre, 170 children’s were participated in this centre regular.  To empower the most exploited and oppressed people
